name: ccs-style
description: A mostly reasonable approach to ECMAScript.

scripts.preinstall: npm run install:config && npm run install:config:base
scripts.install:config: cd packages/eslint-config-ccs && npm prune && npm install
scripts.install:config:base: cd packages/eslint-config-ccs-base && npm prune && npm install
scripts.test: npm run --silent test:config && npm run --silent test:config:base
scripts.travis: npm run --silent travis:config && npm run --silent travis:config:base

author: Childhood Cancer Society <webdev@childhoodcancersociety.org>
